result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leah Nichole Metzger

1:30 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Leah Nichole Metzger. Defendant Leah Nichole Metzger in court. Court reviews case. Atty Dolfi notes DE does not have verification at this time and requested additional time for resolution. ADA Rockow does not object. Court sets STC. Court confirms address and phone number. Court requests verification to be provided at next hearing. Adjourned 01:40 PM
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Status conference on November 10, 2022 at 11:45 am.

10:30 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Defendant Leah Nichole Metzger not in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Leah Nichole Metzger.  Prosecuting attorney Karl E Anderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Set for Return on Warrant. Atty Dolfi states DE is currently hospitalized with pneumonia. Court sets further hearing and DE to appear in person with verification from hospitalization. Adjourned at 10:32 AM.  gll
Return on warrant scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Return on warrant on September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:40 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Karl E Anderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Leah Nichole Metzger. Defendant Leah Nichole Metzger not in court. Set for STC. Court reviews case. Court notes rescheduled to today from last week. DA Anderson requests warrant- body only- adjoining states- okay if stayed. Atty Dolfi states unknown of DE whereabouts for today. Court issues STAYED warrant- body only- adjoining states until 09/20/22 at 10:30 AM. Court sets RW. adjourned 10:41 PM
Return on warrant scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Return on warrant on September 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.

9:38 AMCO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Leah Nicole Metzger. Defendant Leah Nicole Metzger in court. Victim Witness appeared. Court reviews case. S/T Deputy S. Caress. Direct by ADA Ballo. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Redirect by Atty Ballo. Cross by Court. Witness released. Atty arguments. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for ARGN. ARGN: Atty Dolfi enters NG plea and reserve on pre plea rights. Waives speedy trial. Court sets STC. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned
Status conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: Appointing Atty Dolfi. km
Filed by DA's Office. km
Preliminary hearing on July 12, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kathleen L. or her residence.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

01:42 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. DA:  Karl Anderson with Student Intern Ali Casey   DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi for today  DF:  Leah Nichole Metzger appeared from jail. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond argument; bond ordered. Atty Dolfi waives speedy prelim. Court sets Prelim in person. Adjourned at 1:45 PM.  gll  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 09:45 am.
